special_text:
Audition for black. [i](Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink, or a Warlock Role giving 2/1 and flying. Roles replace older ones.)[/i]
Until end of turn, if a creature you don’t control would die, instead exile it and that creature’s controller loses 2 life.
